name: 9th Company: Roots of Terror
summary:
9th Company Roots of Terror is an action-oriented real-time strategy game based on actual events that took place during the Soviet military campaign in Afghanistan.

9th Company follows the story of a ragged band of young recruits undergoing brutal training in Uzbekistan’s Fergana Valley and culminates with a bloody stand against the Mujahideen warriors on a nameless mountain top in Afghanistan. It’s the Battle of Thermopylae all over again: one Russian fighter against 10 Afghanis!

9th Company recreates in detail the events that took place during the last large-scale Soviet military operation. Few know the history: the 9th Company of the 345th Guards Airborne Regiment came under heavy fire on “Hill 3234” on January 7th, 1988. They managed to stop several attacks by an estimated 400 Mujahideen and Pakistani mercenaries and held their position for two gory days. The company lost 6 men, and the remaining 28 of the total 39 were wounded. Two 9th Company soldiers were posthumously awarded the Golden Star medal and the title of Soviet Hero.

name: 9th Dawn II
summary: A large scale fully openworld RPG full of fast-paced action, dungeon crawling, with single or multiplayer adventures! Fight plenty of ferocious monsters, collect masses of loot and take on ancient lost puzzles within the depths of Caspartia!

name: 9th Dawn
summary: 9th Dawn is an old school tile base fantasy role playing game. It harkens back to the days of Ultima 4 or 5, or similar tile based games of the mid to late 1980s. The game took quite a long time to finish so there is a lot to see and explore in 9th Dawn. 9th Dawn II is in the works and I for one look forward to that.

name: 9th Dawn Classic
summary: Explore the huge open world of Montelorne, full of hidden locations, a huge variety of vicious monsters and incredible massive loot!

name: 9: The Dark Side of Notre Dame
9: The Last Resort
summary: 9: The Last Resort is a surreal point-and-click adventure game in which you have just inherited a large mansion and have to get rid of the 9 evil muses that have taken it over.

name: 9 Tiles .
summary:
Boost your brain! Tap the right tiles to repeat the pattern. 
 
9 Tiles will let you improve your visual skills by training your brain. Tap tiles to activate them and reproduce the displayed pattern. 
Beware, the pattern can rotate at any time. You will have to find your way with the help of the arrow. Easy to understand, hard to master. 
 
Each good answer gives you extra time and bonus points. But each wrong answer will reset your bonus points.

name: 9 to 5 Smash It
summary: 9 to 5 Smash It is a fast paced wave smasher. Work your way to the top at ZaamCore Enterprises by smashing the competition! Punch your mechanical coworkers by pushing your phone forward. The faster you move your phone, the harder you punch. Destroy enough of your coworkers and who knows how far you can climb the corporate ladder in 9 to 5 Smash It!

name: 9 Till Void
summary: 9 Till Void is a turn-based deckbuilding roguelike that features neither deck nor cards. As the newly-appointed Spellsword of these lands, you must fight your way through the corruption, with an arsenal of carefully chosen spells, to reach the source of darkness and destroy it from within.

name: 9th Dawn III
summary:
9th Dawn III is a massive 2D open world RPG and collectathon dungeon crawler packed full of adventure! When asked to investigate mysterious, ghostly sightings around the lake of Elmson, you trek through the lands of Cedaltia to uncover the truth. Upon arrival, you hear rumors of an untrustworthy king. Taking the path of the Chosen One, you journey to Lorwyck Castle to confront a powerful enemy – traversing ancient fortresses, dark dungeons, perilous swamps, and more!

Soon, you find yourself at the heart of a foreboding prophecy. Equip your best gear and adventure across the fields of Ashwick, the snowy regions of Halstom, dense forests of Vlak, the sprawling depths of huge dungeons, and the perilous Hollow Mountains of Scorn on an epic quest to uncover the secrets of a mysterious evil force ...

Can you become the savior of Cadaltia?

• Explore a huge, seamless open world full of crypts, fortresses, villages, and more.
• Find your way across deadly dungeons, fight over 270 unique monsters, and acquire loot, treasures, and rare materials.
• Become the ultimate warrior as you unlock spells and abilities, fine-tune your attributes, and level-up your crafting abilities!
• Recruit monsters! Turn them into powerful allies with care and combat skill training.
• Collect 1,400 uniquely drawn items – including more than 300 weapons and 550 pieces of armor and accessories.
• Customize weapons and armour, go fishing, cook food, collect gems, and more!
• Kick back and play Fyued, an original card game played throughout the region with 180 collectable cards!
• Enjoy an original orchestral soundtrack.
• Help the townsfolk to prosper with sidequests that range from silly to dangerous!

name: 9th Land
summary: 9th Land is a family co-op multiplayer action-adventure game set in a fantasy world with elements of community simulation.

name: 9 to Die
summary: Your offices main server has made all of the electronics blood thirsty and you have to go and reboot the server. You will have to go through walls and floors to get to it.

name: 9th Sentinel Sisters
summary: The battle of the clone girls unfolds on a post-apocalyptic Earth, devastated by the alien life form known as "Bleed." Pilot the manned weapon "Father" to eliminate enemies. Upgrade weapons, create powerful builds, and strategize to successfully clear stages.

name: 9th Dawn Remake
summary: Rediscover the magic of the 9th Dawn series with this complete re-imagining of the original game. Venture into a massive 2.5D open world. Explore 45 new dungeons in top-down or first-person view, craft weapons, raise pets, play a deck-building card game, and take down the Castle of Maltyr!

name: 9 Trials of Whiskers
summary: 9 Trials of Whiskers is a cute 3D precision platformer! Run, jump, and dodge hazards as you race through 9 mystical Trials. Play on Very Easy Difficulty for a relaxed climb or push your limits on Hard. Compete against ghost runs to master every challenge!

name: 9 To Ashes
summary: Survive an intense horror inspired by Indonesian folklore. Evade the cunning Tuyul and other astral beings, explore eerie, haunted environments, and uncover sinister secrets hidden within the supernatural darkness.
